heading: ʻOku hōifua ʻa Sīsū ki he ngaahi lea ʻa ʻĪsaiá—ʻOkú ne fekau ki he kakaí ke nau fakatotolo faivelenga ʻi he ngaahi tohi ʻa e kau palōfitá—ʻOku tānaki mai ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa Samuela ko e Tangata Leimaná ʻo kau ki he Toetuʻú ki heʻenau ngaahi lekōtí. Taʻu T.S. 34 nai.

verses.txt: Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, ʻoku totonu ke mou fakatotolo ki he ngaahi meʻá ni. ʻIo, ʻoku ou fai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e fekau ke mou fakatotolo faivelenga ki he ngaahi meʻá ni; he ʻoku mahuʻinga ʻa e ngaahi lea ʻa ʻĪsaiá.
He ko e moʻoni naʻá ne lea ki he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku kau ki hoku kakai ʻa ia ʻoku ʻo e fale ʻo ʻIsilelí; ko ia kuo pau foki ke ne lea ki he kau Senitailé.
Pea ko e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē naʻá ne leaʻakí kuo hoko pe ʻe hoko, ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi lea naʻá ne leaʻakí.
Ko ia tokanga ki heʻeku ngaahi leá; tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó u tala kiate kimoutolú; pea fakatatau ki he taimi mo e finangalo ʻo e Tamaí ʻe ʻalu atu ia ki he kau Senitailé.
Pea ko ia ia ʻe tokanga ki heʻeku ngaahi leá pea fakatomala mo papitaisó, ko ia ia ʻe fakamoʻuí. Fakatotolo ki he kau palōfitá, he ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tokolahi ʻoku nau fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi meʻá ni.

Pea ko ʻeni naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he hili ʻa e folofola ʻaki ʻe Sīsū ʻa e ngaahi folofola ní naʻá ne toe folofola kiate kinautolu, ʻi he hili ʻene fakamatalaʻi kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi folofola kotoa pē ʻa ia kuo nau maʻú, naʻá ne folofola kiate kinautolu: Vakai, ʻoku ʻi ai mo e ngaahi folofola kehe ʻoku ou loto ke mou tohi, ʻa ia kuo teʻeki ai ke mou tohi.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻá ne folofola kia Nīfai: ʻOmi ki heni ʻa e lekooti ʻa ia kuó ke tauhí.
Pea ʻi he ʻomi ʻe Nīfai ʻa e ngaahi lekōtí, ʻo ne tuku ia ʻi hono ʻaó, naʻe ʻafio ki ai hono fofongá ʻo ne folofola:

Ko e moʻoni ʻoku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu, naʻá ku fekauʻi ʻeku tamaioʻeiki ko Samuela, ko e tangata Leimaná, ke ne fakamoʻoni ki he kakaí ni, ʻi he ʻaho ko ia ʻe fakaongoongoleleiʻi ai ʻe he Tamaí ʻa hono huafá ʻiate aú ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kau māʻoniʻonitokolahi ʻe tuʻu hake mei he maté, pea hā mai ki he tokolahi, ʻo tauhi kiate kinautolu. Pea naʻá ne folofola kiate kinautolu: ʻIkai naʻe hoko ia ʻo hangē ko ʻene leá?
Pea naʻe tali kiate ia ʻe heʻene kau ākongá ʻo pehē: ʻIo, ʻEiki, naʻe kikite ʻa Samuela ʻo hangē ko hoʻo ngaahi folofolá, pea naʻe hoko kotoa ia.

Pea naʻe folofola ʻa Sīsū kiate kinautolu: Ko e hā kuo ʻikai ai te mou tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ní, naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoni tokolahi naʻa nau tuʻu hake ʻo hā ki he tokolahi mo tauhi kiate kinautolu.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe manatuʻi ʻe Nīfai kuo ʻikai tohi ʻa e meʻá ni.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe fekau ʻe Sīsū ke tohi ia; ko ia naʻe tohi ia ʻo hangē ko ʻene fekaú.

Pea ko ʻeni naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe hili hono fakamatalaʻi fakataha ʻe Sīsū ʻa e ngaahi folofola, ʻa ia kuo nau tohí, naʻá ne fekau kiate kinautolu ke nau akonaki ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó ne fakamatalaʻi kiate kinautolú.
